selectOpt.title: Theme Store
selectOpt.description: Help Page for the theme store

messageOpt.content: Winston now includes a theme store! Go to Settings -> Appearance -> Theme Store or to download many awesome themes. You can find the same themes on this server in the <#1156879859667177573> channel. If you want to upload a theme of your own please do `/theme submit` in this discord server to submit your theme for review.
